name: The Forgotten Dungeon
description:
The Forgotten Dungeon is a simple yet challenging platformer in which you take the control of an adventurer trapped on a dangerous dungeon filled with traps and enemies that want to kill you. Would you survive and reach the exit?

Features:

-Nice handmade pixel art graphics.

-Original Soundtrack.

-5 rooms with challenging traps and enemies.

-Easy gameplay control, click to jump.

Click to jump, slide on the walls and click again to jump to the other side and change your run direction. You can not stop unless there is a block or a wall in front of you, so think about your movements carefully. Press ESC key to close the game. 

(You can also use the SPACE key)

Hope you enjoy this little game, follow me on twitter or visit my web to be in touch and get news of future updates and projects.
